subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Chris Moon/Frank's Box on YouTube
author: Robin Searcy Henson
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0031_01C84C10.82917E60
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Frank, I've been impressed with your work since I was first made aware of i=
t several years ago.  I didn't mean to infer there was a problem with the b=
ox, but rather was questioning the interpretation of the person using it.  =
You're anything but a failure, and my inability to hear what he hears is ce=
rtainly no reflection on you.  I've heard amazing stuff out of your contrap=
tions, so I know it's real and it works.  So much of this is subjective tho=
ugh.  The one EVP I consider my most profound success is inaudible to every=
one I've played it for.  Sometimes I feel like I'll go crazy because it's s=
o absolutely clear to me--How is it possible that no one else can hear it??=
  I also agree that the most success in this field will come from good inte=
ntions and a pure heart, because this is spiritual work as much as it is sc=
ientific.  Just wanted to say I appreciate and admire you.

Robin


  -----=
 Original Message ----- 
  From: Jason Lewis<mailto:immortallic2@...>=
 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> 
  Sent: Mo=
nday, December 31, 2007 8:26 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Chris Moon/Fra=
nk's Box on YouTube


  Agreed...

  Lisby <lisby@...<mailto:lisb=
y@...>> wrote: 

    Let's not let our heads get too swollen, tho=
, Jason. ;) 


    Ann




    On Dec 31, 2007, at 10:09 PM, Jason Lewis wr=
ote:




      Frank,
      To someone that we all look up to as an inspera=
tion I can say that you can make the best box ever and the results might ju=
st depend on the person or user of the product...
      Keep working in thi=
s direction, keep being a good person.  Remember one thing, we are the ligh=
t in the darkness!  There will always be people that will try to rain on OU=
R parade.  We have to be the voice of reason so WE can move forward.  This =
is not about us!  Its about TRUTH and the light and research.  Thanks for e=
verything you have done and continue to do!!
      I think personally that =
these devices work best when the user is not using the device for personal =
gain, but for everyones best intrests!!

      Happy New Year!

      Frank=
 Sumption <franks-boxes@...> wrote:
        I don't know if maybe t=
he audio pick up from the box wasn't very good, 
        but I can't make o=
ut much of that either. It sounds like the recordings 
        I do with a =
cell phone. I think you'd have to be there to judge it. 

        Personall=
y I'm always disappointed at my stuff being out there, and 
        the inc=
redible lack of clarity obatained with it, to me that's a huge 
        fai=
lure! I know the stuff works, but how to get it to a level that can 
      =
  be understood by most, that's the problem, and my focus at the moment. 
 =
       The Mini Box is big step in that direction, so some of the pressure =
if 
        off, but I still need to get my boxes to professional level. 

=
        Frank-S
